    • Field Detail

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning
        Boolean for determining whether the patrol has been hit by water and should be running away.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlienPatrol

        public AlienPatrol(Tower tower,
                   Vector2 vec,
                   float alertRange,
                   float angryRange,
                   Vector2 pos,
                   java.lang.String textureFilePathDisengaged,
                   java.lang.String textureFilePathAlert,
                   java.lang.String textureFilePathAngry,
                   SpriteHandler spriteHandler)
        Creates the patrol base body, fixture and sprite. Also creates the patrol sensor bodies and fixtures in addition to variable assignment.
        Parameters:
        tower - The tower the patrol belongs to
        vec - The diameter of the patrol base in meters
        alertRange - The range of the patrol in meters (The * size of the first patrol sensor entity)
        angryRange - The attack range of the patrol in meters (The * size of the second patrol sensor entity)
        pos - The starting positon of the patrol in meters
        screen - The screen the patrol will be created in
        textureFilePathDisengaged - The file path for the texture for when the patrol does not have a target in range
        textureFilePathAlert - The file path for the texture for when the patrol does have a target in its first range
        textureFilePathAngry - The file path for the texture for when the patrol does have a target in its second range

    • Method Detail

      • prepareSerialisation

        public void prepareSerialisation()
        Description copied from class: Entity
        Prepare to be serialised @Assessment 4

        Effectively null-ifies all attrs linked to global state

        Note; these *must* be recovered if the Entity is to work again

        Overrides:
        prepareSerialisation in class Entity

      • insertShared

        public void insertShared(SpriteHandler sp,
                         Tower t)

      • setTarget

        public void setTarget(Body target)
        Called when a truck enters the angry range. Sets the patrol to be angry, moving towards the player in mindless fury. It stops after two seconds of a faster lunge.
        Parameters:
        target - the target Box2D body to attack/fire at

      • killTower

        public void killTower()
        Kills the tower, marking this patrol as a lonely orphan.

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean active)
        Sets the state of the patrol to alert or not
        Parameters:
        active - true = The tower can fire, False = The tower can not fire

      • getHit

        public void getHit()
        Called when the patrol is hit by a water projectile. @Assessment 4

      • onDeath

        public void onDeath()
        Called when it is hit by a water projectile and the tower it belongs to is destroyed

      • hitFireEng

        public void hitFireEng()

      • hasHitFireEng

        public boolean hasHitFireEng()

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        * The update method needs to be called every world update: The movement for the patrol is handled here.
        Parameters:
        delta - The time in seconds that have elapsed in world time (Excludes time taken to draw, render etc) since the last Gdx delta call.

      • hasReset

        public boolean hasReset()
